params.bridgeParams: The bridge parameters struct containing all data for the bridge operation.
params.permitParams: The permit parameters struct containing the EIP-2612 signature and deadline. Requirements: - The contract must not be paused. - The permit signature must be valid and not expired. - All validations in _validateBridgeParams must pass. - Transfers and approvals must succeed.

params.bridgeParams: The bridge parameters struct containing all data for the bridge operation.
params.hookData: Arbitrary hook data to append to the burn message for interpretation on the destination domain. Requirements: - The contract must not be paused. - The permit signature must be valid and not expired. - All validations in _validateBridgeParams must pass. - hookData must not be empty. - Transfers and approvals must succeed.
params.permitParams: The permit parameters struct containing the EIP-2612 signature and deadline.

params.bridgeParams: The bridge parameters struct containing all data for the bridge operation. Requirements: - The contract must not be paused. - All validations in _validateBridgeParams must pass. - Transfers and approvals must succeed.
The bridge parameters struct containing all data for the bridge operation.
params.hookData: Arbitrary hook data to append to the burn message for interpretation on the destination domain. Requirements: - The contract must not be paused. - All validations in _validateBridgeParams must pass. - hookData must not be empty. - Transfers and approvals must succeed.

calculateFeeShares(uint256).details: Calculates the developer and protocol shares for a given amount and fee.

params.fee: The fee amount or basis points (absolute or bips)

returns.developerShare: The amount that goes to the developer (in token's smallest unit)
returns.protocolShare: The amount that goes to the protocol (in token's smallest unit)

getProtocolFee(uint256).details: Returns the protocol fee for a given developer fee.

params.fee: The developer fee amount (in token's smallest unit)

returns.protocolFee: The protocol's share (in token's smallest unit)

getProtocolFeeConfig().details: Returns the current protocol fee configuration.

returns.protocolFeeShareBips: Protocol fee share in basis points (0-10000)
returns.protocolFeeWallet: Address where protocol fees are sent

initialize(address,address).details: Initialize the contract (replaces constructor for upgradeable contracts)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setProtocolFeeConfig(uint256,address).details: Sets all protocol fee configuration parameters at once. Only callable by the contract owner.

params.bips: The protocol fee share in basis points (0-10000).
params.wallet: The address to receive protocol fees.

setProtocolFeeShare(uint256).details: Sets the protocol fee share in basis points (0-10000, where 10000 = 100%). Only callable by the contract owner.

params.bips: The new protocol fee share in basis points.

setProtocolFeeWallet(address).details: Sets the protocol fee wallet address. Only callable by the contract owner.

params.wallet: The address to receive protocol fees.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

version().details: Get the version of this contract implementation

bridgeWithPermit((uint256,uint256,uint25.notice: Bridges tokens using permit for approval (EIP-2612 signature-based approval).

bridgeWithPermitAndHook((uint256,uint256.notice: Bridges tokens using permit for approval and includes hook data for destination interpretation.

bridgeWithPreapproval((uint256,uint256,u.notice: Bridges tokens with pre-approval (no permit, requires prior ERC20 approval).

bridgeWithPreapprovalAndHook((uint256,ui.notice: Bridges tokens with pre-approval and includes hook data for destination interpretation.

cctpContract().notice: The CCTP contract interface used for cross-chain token transfers.
